first:
Tonight I dreamed of numbers... %s.
I have no idea what they mean!
messages:
Again I dreamed of the numbers %s.
Something tells me they are related to the plains...

The numbers %s appeared again in my dream.
I need to discover what they represent.

Another night haunted by %s.
I feel like they point to a path.

Once again the numbers %s appeared.
They seem to indicate something important.

I dreamed again of %s.
Something awaits me in the structure on the plains.
